an output som=

utput value (its "energy" as it were) from the node is 
fed through weighte=

onservation of energy" principal on the ANN?

n actual neural net, when a neuron fires its

omehow to its connecting neurons.  The

ted neurons can not be more than the 
energy generated by the sending neuro=
n.  What if in an ANN, the value

ed inputs could not
